channel.title: SFM
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SFM, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Birkin bag maker Hermes posts better-than-expected jump in fourth-quarter sales
item.description: Haute couture fashion house Hermes on Friday reported a better-than-expected jump in fourth quarter sales.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Airbnb pops more than 14%, its best day ever, on earnings beat
item.description: Airbnb shares surged more than 14% and recorded their best day ever after the company reported stronger-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings.

item.title: Moderna beats on revenue but loses more than expected as it scales down manufacturing
item.description: It marks another quarter of growing pains for the company, which is racing to launch new products and recover from the decline of its Covid business.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Trump Media reports $400 million in 2024 losses
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group is worth almost $7 billion, but the company generated less than $4 million in revenue in 2024, according to a new filin...

item.title: Roku shares surge as company halves quarterly losses, adds 4 million streaming households
item.description: Roku CEO Anthony Wood said more than half of U.S. broadband households now watch TV with Roku.
